title: Tools & Items SFX
description: A collection of 161 sound effects suitable for Tools & other Items
longDescription:
Introducing the Tools & Items SFX Pack for Unreal Engine!

Introducing our comprehensive tools & items sound effect pack for game development, featuring over 160 high-quality sound effects for more than 40 different tools and other items. With this pack, you can add realistic and immersive sound effects to your games, enhancing the overall experience for your players.


This pack includes a diverse range of sounds, covering a wide variety of tools and items that may be found in various games, such as hammers, saws, phones, and many more. All of the sound effects in this pack are provided in high-quality WAV format, ensuring that they can be easily integrated into any game engine or development environment.


What is in this pack?

This pack includes 161 high quality sound effect suitable for Tools & Items

  • 20 Page sounds
  • 30 Paper sounds
  • 7 Writing sounds
  • 10 Typewriter sounds
  • 31 Phone sounds
  • 1 No Signal sound
  • 2 Chainsaw sounds
  • 2 Electric Drill sounds
  • 2 Hammer sounds
  • 2 Hand Saw sounds
  • 1 Lawn Mower sound
  • 2 Plier sounds
  • 4 Shovel sounds
  • 4 Pill Bottle sounds
  • 1 Book sound
  • 2 Bulb Horn sounds
  • 10 Record Needle sounds
  • 4 Computer sounds
  • 7 Material sounds
  • Cloth
  • Money
  • Plastic
  • 1 Polaroid sound
  • 8 Cassette sounds
  • 2 Sewing Machine sounds
  • 2 Knife Sharpening sounds
  • 2 Tape Recorder sounds
  • 2 Velcro sounds
  • 1 Wiper sound


Want a Preview! Check some of this packs effects on SoundCloud!

https://on.soundcloud.com/oBwFV﻿


Got any questions? Feel free to send me an email!

AssetAttic@outlook.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  161 High quality game sound effects
  •  Sounds for various tools
  • Sounds for various items (i.e. Books, Pill Bottles, etc.)
  •  Matching sound cues

Number of Audio Waves: 161

Number of Audio Cues: 161

Sample rate / bit rate: 48.000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
